item.title: Opendiameter Compilation Instructions
item.description: For FC8 Make sure gcc , gcc-c++ , bison , flex , make , openssl and openssl-devel are present yum -y install boost-devel export BOOST_ROOT=/usr/include/ Get ACE Here . tar xvf ACE-5.5.tar.gz cd ACE_wrappers mkdir build cd build Patch the configure file â€” configure.orig 2008-08-05 11:11:19.000000000 -0800 +++ configure 2008-08-05 11:13:30.
